plot outline: The apathetic boy in his mid-twenties leads a semi-luxurious life in Trivandrum with no goals. He lives with his uncle, Pappichayan, who is an expert in Marmani, traditional physiotherapy originating in Kerala. Despite lack of interest, Aniyan learns Marmani. However, he lands in trouble with the police and is shipped off to the United States to live with his sisters. Aniyan's struggle with the fast-paced life, his chance encounter with a laid-off US Football superstar and his brush with destiny in the foreign land that teaches him the importance of native land forms the crux of the movie.
title: Aniyankunjum Thannalayathu
plot: Life works in mysterious ways. Destiny takes human on a journey unforeseen and unexpected. In such cases, man can only brace himself for what is to come. A story of destiny that makes Aniyan Kunju travel the world.

The apathetic boy in his mid-twenties leads a semi-luxurious life in Trivandrum with no goals. He lives with his uncle, Pappichayan, who is an expert in Marmani, traditional physiotherapy originating in Kerala. Despite lack of interest, Aniyan learns Marmani. However, he lands in trouble with the police and is shipped off to the United States to live with his sisters. Aniyan's struggle with the fast-paced life, his chance encounter with a laid-off US Football superstar and his brush with destiny in the foreign land that teaches him the importance of native land forms the crux of the movie.
